sub_fields.label: Video Info
sub_fields.message: If we are going to use a video then the image you select will become also the placeholder for the video as it is preloading

fields.label: Display Admin Options
fields.name: display_admin_options
fields.instructions: Enable this option to display extra options on each module on each page/post template. Its recommended to leave it disabled on production.

fields.label: General Information
fields.message: Please fill this fields, they are going to be used across the site on several places.

fields.label: Office Hours
fields.name: office_hours
fields.instructions: This field is supposed to have raw html to offer flexibility when creating the office hours.

fields.label: Copyright
fields.name: copyright
fields.instructions: Use the shortcode [theme_date y=1] to display the current year and [theme_footer_image] to display the footer image defined on the next input.

fields.label: Use images for the social media
fields.name: use_images_for_the_social_media
fields.instructions: If you Dont want to use the font icons and prefer to use images for the social media check this and upload the images
